title: BARD - Required Standard of Care
itunes:title: BARD - Required Standard of Care
description:
Mark and Gary link up on Sunday morning to discuss Gavin Newsom's signing of previously discussed California Assembly Bill 2098 governing what doctors can say to their patients. They also discuss a development in the Erika Jayne Tom Girardi saga and tease a story that'll be covered in further depth early this week with Adam.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
